column4:
I hope this email finds you well.

I am Sally Sneaky
column5: from the IT team at Proximus. I am writing to inform you that your business unit's Microsoft Office License is changing soon. To ensure a smooth transition
column6:
kindly review the details by clicking on the button below.

Your prompt review and action will be greatly appreciated.

Thank you for your attention to this important matter.

Sincerely
column7:
Sally Sneaky
